audioText: Le nouveau manager prendra ses fonctions dès le mois prochain pour diriger l'équipe commerciale.
question: When will the new manager take up his duties?
options: At the end of this month.
explanation: The text states 'Le nouveau manager prendra ses fonctions dès le mois prochain pour diriger l'équipe commerciale' - The new manager will take up his duties starting next month to lead the commercial team. 'Prendra' is the future form of 'prendre' (to take), and 'dès' means 'starting from' or 'as of'.
